Title: Client Models Specification
Summary: Specification for Client and ClientType models
Content:
Namespace: InvoicingApp.Models

Client class:
- Properties: Id (Guid), Name (string), Email (string), Address (string), Type (ClientType), TaxId (string).
- Purpose: Represents a client that can receive invoices, either a business or an individual.

ClientType enum:
- Values: Person, Business.
- Purpose: Indicates whether the client is a business or an individual.

Invoice class:
- Properties: Id (Guid), Client (Client), IssueDate (DateTime), DueDate (DateTime), Status (InvoiceStatus, default Draft), Currency (string, default "USD"), LineItems (List<InvoiceLineItem>, default empty), TotalAmount (decimal, calculated as sum of line item totals).
- Purpose: Represents an invoice issued to a client.

InvoiceLineItem class:
- Properties: Description (string), Quantity (int), UnitPrice (decimal), Total (decimal, calculated as Quantity * UnitPrice).
- Purpose: Represents a single line item on an invoice.

InvoiceStatus enum:
- Values: Draft, Sent, Paid, Overdue, Cancelled.
- Purpose: Possible statuses for an invoice.

All types are public and reside in the InvoicingApp.Models namespace.

This specification documents the public surface of the models used by the SDK.
